def_cn: 顺从;屈服;投降;被迫接受
def_en: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist.

def_cn: 提交，递呈(建议、报告或请求)
def_en: If you submit a proposal, report, or request to someone, you formally send it to them so that they can consider it or decide about it.
